title: Shawl thing: the surprising rise in tiny scarves
description: In this week’s newsletter: The knitted micro-scarf is emerging as an absurd yet functional must-haveUsually, miniature things in fashion are known for their cuteness rather than their practicality. Think a teeny-tiny bag that can hold little more than a bank card. But now, the knitted micro-scarf is emerging as an absurd yet functional must-have.Triangular in shape, one of the bestselling patterns on PetiteKnit, the site of Danish knitwear designer Mette Wendelboe Okkels, is for a scarf that measures just 80cm x 13cm, covering just a small portion of the glands of the neck. The Ukrainian knitwear store AnnaGriHandmade has an even tinier version of this style, measuring 68cm x 8cm. Continue reading...
author: Chloe Mac Donnell

title: ‘I can’t imagine wearing anything else’: Goodbye to Old Town, the beloved Norfolk clothing company
description: Stylish but timeless, Old Town’s utility-inspired tailored clothes have won many fans among artists and celebrities. Now it’s to close, leaving devoted customers bereftThe premise of Old Town clothing was a simple one: choose from a limited range of designs and fabrics (cotton drill, canvas, linen or cord), provide your measurements and, a few weeks later, a box would arrive through the post containing your trousers, jacket or skirt, handmade in Norfolk by designer Will Brown, Marie Willey and their team of 10 seamstresses. But this year Old Town announced they are not taking any further orders and is winding down the main business – news greeted with anguish among their regular clients, including myself.“We’re 68, we are tired,” Willey says. “We made a rod for our own backs because we’ve micromanaged things to the point it’s worn us out.” Each had clearly defined roles – Willey dealing with customers and ordering fabric, Brown the designing and making. In fact, he was the only person who knew how to operate the buttonhole sewing machine so he did them all himself, for years. Continue reading...
author: Luke Turner

title: 15 Popular Nordstrom Shoes For Every Winter Occasion
description: Between the drop in temperature and the occasional rainy or snowy commute, winter is a convenient excuse to add some fresh shoes to the rotation, and Nordstrom is one of our favorite retailers to start our search. With its vast selection ranging from Nordstrom brands to designer options, it's easy to find a pair that fits your style at a price you're comfortable spending. After poring over the retailer's inventory, we're eyeing all of the shoes we can't wait to slip into for everything from holiday parties to gym workouts. We've honed in on a variety of styles, including sneakers, boots, comfortable heels, and everything in between. If you're ready to give your shoe selection a winter refresh, browse our curated list of Nordstrom's most covetable shoe styles.
author: Angela Elias

title: The 15 Most Comfortable Walking Shoes
description: Having comfortable walking shoes incorporated into your wardrobe is a no-brainer, especially if you travel regularly or have an unbearably long commute to the office. When shopping for the best walking shoes, it's important to look for pairs that are versatile enough to keep you feeling both supported and chic, regardless of where your day takes you. We find that fashionable walking shoes are the perfect happy medium, because they not only look good with all of your favorite outfits, but they're also the exact type of shoe we want to slip into for a concert or when we're out exploring a new city. Alternatively, if you love to take long walks around the neighborhood or to your local coffee shop, it's essential that you have a great pair of stylish walking shoes on hand. It's not always easy to find the best of both worlds with style and comfort, but we're here to make it possible. Ahead, we rounded up the most comfortable walking shoes that'll look great with all your outfits, from sleek trousers to stretchy, sculpting leggings - and they'll also give your feet the support they need for long excursions. Whether you're looking for the best sneakers for walking, are in the market for a pair of classic white sneakers, or simply want to stock up on good shoes for walking all day, we have no doubt you'll be able to find your new favorite wardrobe essential here. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best shoes for walking and standing all day. These comfortable walking shoes are options you'll want to slip into time and time again.
author: Kyley Warren

title: 25 Winter Wedding Guest Outfits (Jumpsuits & Pants Included) To Be Best Dressed
description: If you haven’t already, it’s time to start planning your winter wedding guest outfits. Whether you’re looking for a new party dress or are partial to formal pants, we’re here to help you get the ball rolling on your search for what to wear to this season's nuptials. These festivities are a chance to play around with seasonal colors and dazzling fabrics — think velvet dresses and special-occasion jumpsuits for more formal affairs, or sequin numbers that embody that New Year vibe.We’ve rounded up 25 winter wedding guest outfit ideas for every dress code, budget, and personal style. Ahead, find the best winter dresses, jumpsuits, and pantsuits from reader-favorite retailers like Free People, Reformation, Zara, and more that’ll get you on the best-dressed list for every party.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Black-tie Wedding Guest DressesFormal winter weddings likely require black-tie dresses, which should probably be floor-length but certainly don’t have to be black. Look out for rich jewel tones in satin or iridescent fabrics. We’re eyeing holiday-appropriate ruffles for extra dimension and drama. Then, throw on a faux-fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop EloquiiEloquii Dramatic Ruffle Gown, $, available at EloquiiMichael Costello x Revolve Loren GownShop RevolveMichael Costello x revolve Loren Gown, $, available at RevolveStaud Calluna Iridescent DressShop StaudStaud Calluna Iridescent Dress, $, available at StaudShow Me Your Mumu Greta DressShop Show Me Your MumuShow Me Your Mumu Greta Dress, $, available at Show Me Your MumuHouse of Harlow 1960 x Revolve Astra GownShop RevolveHouse of Harlow 1960 x Revolve Astra Gown, $, available at RevolveCocktail Wedding Guest DressesCocktail attire is one of the most popular special-occasion dress codes. Somewhere in between formal and casual, it allows you (and the party) to move from day to night, and it opens you up to more silhouettes, hemline lengths, and fabrics. For the winter, we recommend midi dresses with delicate lace and mesh trims or elevated bows and pearl embellishments.Shop ReformationReformation Plus Stasia Silk Dress, $, available at ReformationV. Chapman Vera Ruffle-Strap Corset Side-Slit Midi DressShop AnthropologieV. Chapman Vera Ruffle-Strap Corset Side-Slit Midi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi DressShop LulusLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi Dress, $, available at LulusNever Fully Dressed Charcoal Clara DressShop Never Fully DressedNever Fully Dressed Charcoal Clara Dress, $, available at Never Fully DressedLisa Says Gah Meg DressShop Lisa Says GahLisa Says Gah Meg Dress, $, available at Lisa Says GahCasual Wedding Guest DressesFor winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies or restaurant receptions with casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini or midi dresses, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps. (You also can’t go wrong with a velvet maxi.) And don’t be afraid of prints — play with festive plaids and winter florals.Shop Free PeopleFree People Farrier Velvet Mini Dress, $, available at Free PeoplePetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi DressShop Petal & PupPetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi Dress, $, available at Petal & PupSelkie The London DressShop RevolveSelkie The London Dress, $, available at RevolveGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi DressShop Good AmericanGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi Dress, $, available at Good AmericanMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi DressShop MadewellMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi Dress, $, available at MadewellWedding Guest JumpsuitsWe love the idea of a jumpsuit for a winter wedding, because, let’s be honest: We don’t really want our legs exposed to the frigid winter air. To stay warm and comfortable while looking stylish, seek out long-sleeved, high-neck silhouettes in rich velvets and luxe jersey knits. Keep it sleek in black, or test out trendy burgundy, navy blue, or metallic silver styles.Shop City ChicCity Chic Plus Lana Jumpsuit, $, available at City ChicAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless JumpsuitShop Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless Jumpsuit, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With LaceShop AsosTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With Lace, $, available at ASOSBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder JumpsuitShop Macy’sBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder Jumpsuit, $, available at Macy'sOld Navy Fit & Flare Velvet JumpsuitShop Old NavyOld Navy Fit & Flare Velvet Jumpsuit, $, available at Old NavyWedding Guest Pant Suits & Sets These days, pantsuits for wedding guests are chicer than ever before, so we want to put these matching separates on your radar. Be playful with metallic, floral, or striped sets that can be worn on their own with a statement necklace, or with a blouse or vest underneath. When the party’s over, rewear the blazers, tops, and trousers together or separately for winter festivities and office days alike. title: Zara’s Sister Brand Is This Season’s Unexpected Party Outfit Destination
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. As we near the holidays, the avalanche of festivities may have you in a fashion frenzy. What are you gonna wear to your friends’ gift exchange… and family dinner… and your New Years Eve celebration… oh, and everything else this winter? To figure out all of this as you’re simultaneously gift shopping? Decision fatigue is inevitable.That’s why we’re clueing you in on a little retail secret: Zara’s elevated sister brand, Massimo Dutti. The Spanish retailer offers wardrobe staples and plenty of options for all your activities and festivities. Its new eveningwear collection is full of minimalist dress trends (like winter whites), as well as separates that can be mixed, matched, styled up or down — whatever you need.Whether you’re looking for a knit maxi dress that can be worn for cozy gatherings, the office, and Valentine’s Day restaurant reservations or a lace cami that you can layer underneath blazers and pair with mini skirts or jeans, Massimo Dutti houses all your winter dressing dreams. Read on to start building your party outfits all in one place, all at once, so you can go into 2025 in style. DashDividers_1_500x100 Massimo Dutti Winter Tops & Bottoms Massimo Dutti’s eveningwear collection has a range of tops and bottoms that are infinitely versatile. We’re really into this crushed velvet pantsuit, which could be worn for office parties and winter weddings alike. There are also cashmere sweaters, wool skirts, and sequined styles for day and night ‘fits. DashDividers_1_500x100 Massimo Dutti Winter Party Dresses Everyone needs one or two holiday party dresses in their wardrobe, and Massimo Dutti’s are designed to be worn for a variety of events, including cocktail parties, potluck dinners, and holiday bar outings. Pick out a maxi or midi in luxe satin, velvet, organza, or (slightly more casual) wool blends for all your winter soirées. DashDividers_1_500x100 Massimo Dutti Winter Shoes, Bags, & Accessories While the brand’s footwear options are typically the first to fly off the virtual shelves, there are still a few styles available, like trendy slingbacks, to round out your party shoe lineup. You can even complete your winter outfit with sparkly rhinestone jewelry and structural handbags for a full Massimo Dutti look.  Shop full Massimo Dutti eveningwear collection Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Holiday Party Dresses For Winter Celebrations5 Holiday Party Outfit Ideas With Clothes You OwnWinter Wedding Guest Outfits Including Jumpsuits
author: Victoria Montalti
